data.actual_result: The mouse disappears once you move it but you can still navigate the overlay
data.expected_result: The mouse should stay visible and you can navigate the overlay easily
data.short_description: Mouse disappears in Minecraft when using the Overlay (tested on 1.12.2 without any mods)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are using the latest version of Canary which has the new Overlay - Turn the Overlay on and start Minecraft - In Minecraft press the keybind you set to open the overlay - Move your mouse cursor - The mouse should disappear
